name: vision_standard_en_v1
judge_prompt_template: Please evaluate the quality of the response for the vision test based on accuracy, depth, and alignment with the image. Rate each metric on a scale of 1-5 stars (5 stars is best). Provide your final score and detailed reasoning. Response content: {model_output_placeholder} Respond in JSON format: {"score": number, "reasoning": "reason", "breakdown": {"accuracy": number, "depth": number, "alignment": number}}
